[[Northfarthing]] | affiliation= | language= | birth={{SR|1369}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | family=[[Gamgee Family|Gamgee]] | parentage=[[Gaffer Gamgee]] and [[Bell Goodchild]] | siblings=[[Hamson Gamgee|Hamson]], [[Daisy Gamgee|Daisy]], [[May Gamgee|May]], [[Samwise Gamgee|Samwise]] and [[Marigold Gamgee|Marigold]] | spouse= | children= | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Halfred Gamgee''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]]. ==History== Halfred was the second son of [[Gaffer Gamgee|Hamfast Gamgee]]. He moved to the [[Northfarthing]].{{App|Gamgee}} ==Etymology== The name comes from [[Old English]] ''healfrēad'' "half-red, reddish" or from ''healfrǣd'' "half counsel".[[Jim Allan]] (ed.), ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', Giving of names {{references}} [[Category:Hobbits]] [[Category:Gamgee]] [[Category:Third Age characters]] [[de:Halfred Gamdschie (Sohn von Hamfast)]] [[fi:Halfred Gamgi]] [[fr:encyclo:personnages:hobbits:gamegie:halfred gamegie 2]]
